reviewText: I kept putting off buying this dvd for along time thinking my kids wouldnt care much for it but suprisingly they liked it alot.
The item was purchased for our 2 year old granddaughter, she throughly enjoyed this item.

All MLP fans should see this one.... LIVE if you can! We did and it was worth the 8 hr drive. And we bought this one too and the quality is wonderful. This was a well done kids show. Hubby and I were pretty impressed.
HER EYES SPARKLED WHEN SHE OPENED HER BIRTHDAY PRESENT.  VERY POPULAR AMONG THE ALMOST POTTY TRAINED CROWD.

My daughter LOVES this movie - she loves everything my little pony though... This is quite a cute DVD with the costumes and the crowd...  the tunes are catchy and my daughter loves to sing along - even though she is only 3~  EVERYTIME we go to Blockbuster she HAS to rent this so I am going to finally just buy it for her... save some $$$.  Definately worth every penny!  Would recommend to any parent of a horse lover!!

My Little Pony Live: The World's Biggest Tea Party is a Live show that i all way want to see now i can see it all the time ^^ all the characters in it are sooo cute^^ if you have kids that like my little pony or if you are a big fan of my little pony like i am ;) this be a great buy

I like MLP g4, and g3. Now, people have been calling this live pony thing dog barf for a reason!
The ponies skins' look like wet washcloths and streamers taped to their cheap fabric washcloth heads as a mane. There are some creepy ladybugs that keep running around high fiving the children screaming. Instead of A normal kiddy friendly Meet N Greet if looks as if they are stealing the people souls. And... to make it worse, minty's behind bumps into the record and Spike says it gives  him a buttbusting idea... and, WHADDYA KNOW?the ladybugs shake their dangiling buttcheeks to the crowd and the poni- wait a minute... Is this Miley Cyrus?
nope, i was right the first time. they were singing shake your cutie while twerking.
Give me a moment to gouge my eyes out with a sniper after my innocence being ruined.

Though I haven't watched it yet I'm judging by the shape of the package right now. I totally love it. The Pinkie Pie toy I got with it is so cute. Also, I wasn't expecting to be able to turn the box into a play mat area, so that's a bonus I didn't know anything about. I can't wait to see the movie. After I watch it I'll leave more feedback. Which won't be for awhile. I'm starting over and watching all the My Little Ponies in order by release date.
my nieces are very happy with this DVD very pleased with purchase
This grabbed my daughter's attention and they enjoyed it, but didn't love it as much as some of the modern day pony shows.  It was filmed a while back, so the quality of the images were lower.
girls love to see my little pony
I NEVER ORDERED THIS PRODUCT; MUST CHECK MY ACCOUNT. WHAT IS GOING ON? SHAKING MY HEAD;THIS I CANNOT BELIEVE, OMG.

Nice to have a clean movie for the youth to watch. The Live version is so entertaining. This is a Must for any MLP fans.

His Peace to you,
Kyle

Hours of fun for the little ones who love My Little Pony!!! My little girl had a tea party with all her dolls and ponies while watching this, which was great for me, I was able to get some stuff done around the house.  ;-)
I've watched it about 20 times with my girls!! They love it:) i'll be watching this one for the next couple of years that's for sure
received quicker than expected - very excited and happy with my purchase - could not believe how fast I actually received this.
